methods.get: Get an object, or search for a list of objects
methods.head: Get the headers for this response, realisticaly this just means they want to know the count of how many results would be returned if they'd run this query
methods.options: OPTIONS as per the RFC2616 specification, requires that we send any and all allowed methods in an allow header
